Package edu.cornell.library.scholars.webapp.controller.api.distribute

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataDistributor
    Life-cycle of a DataDistributor: Instantiated to service a single HTTP request. init() -- Called one time. getContentType() -- Called one time. writeOutput() -- Called one time. close() -- Called exactly once. Garbage-collected (probably)
    DataDistributorContext
    Make this information available to each DataDistributor instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDataDistributor
    TODO
    DataDistributorContextImpl
    Build a DataDistributorContext around the current HTTP request.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataDistributor.ActionFailedException
    A problem occurred while creating the output.
    DataDistributor.DataDistributorException
    A problem occurred while creating or running the DataDistributor.
    DataDistributor.MissingParametersException
    The HTTP request did not contain one or more required parameters.
    DataDistributor.NoSuchActionException
    The controller could not find a DataDistributor configured for the requested action.
    DataDistributor.NotAuthorizedException
    The user registered to the current HTTP session may not run the DataDistributor for the requested action.
